name: Fighter Booster
description:
first person view is directed to one person named Robert Park 
he is a mercenary who was sent to kenya to kill militia groups 
or militant groups in a small forest of UAC because they are 
very cruel and sadistic. this is the story of the civil war in 
the year 2012-2013 the african civil war and congratulations on
fighter boost
if you want to donate please state what amount you want to 
donate so I can buy fish rice and if you don't want to donate 
that's okay just go to the download page and if you want to 
check my youtube channel here is the link:<a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBtCsIlcUES4ag_F6KsoevQ" 
System Requiments:
4gb ram or Higher
200gb space
intel celeron 
Grapichs Card ATI or Higher
Intel Hd 4000
enjoy the game thank you ^_^
